Package tage.ai.behaviortrees

Class BTComposite

  • java.lang.Object
    • tage.ai.behaviortrees.BTBehavior
      • tage.ai.behaviortrees.BTComposite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BTSelector, BTSequence
    public abstract class BTComposite
extends BTBehavior
    A BTComposite node is an inner node that maintains a collection of BTBehavior child nodes. BTComposite is implemented as an abstract class. BTComposite nodes contain an ID variable so that it can be distinguished between other composite nodes. This helps when inserting nodes into a behavior tree.
    Author:
    Kenneth Barnett, Alex J. Champandard
    See Also:
    Behavior Trees Tutorial Video

    Behavior Trees Starter Kit
